text: Diklo () is a village in the historical region of Tusheti, Georgia. Administratively, it is part of the Akhmeta Municipality in Kakheti. It lies between the Greater Caucasus Mountain Range and the Pirikita Range of Tusheti. ==See also== * Kakheti == Sources == * Georgian Soviet Encyclopedia, V. 3, p. 551, Tbilisi, 1978 year. ==References== Category:Populated places in Kakheti
title: Diklo (village)
